output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF (CMF: 11240002) - This is clearly marked as electoral propaganda with a CMF number
2. Refers to candidates: - Mentions Nicolae Ciucă (presidential candidate) - Mentions Ilie Bolojan (potential PM)
3. Addresses wide population: - Clearly addresses the general public - Uses paid advertising on Facebook and Instagram - Uses inclusive language ("Împreună", "Haideți")
4. Electoral objective: - Explicit call to vote ("Votați PNL") - Promotes PNL's vision and candidates - Makes electoral promises - Specifically targets parliamentary elections (which is allowed) - However, also promotes Nicolae Ciucă who is a presidential candidate (which is not allowed after campaign period)
5. Not journalism: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains party slogans and campaign promises
6. Not personal opinion: - This is an official party communication with CMF number - Structured as a campaign message

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: 1. Contains CMF number 2. Makes explicit electoral promises 3. Contains direct call to vote 4. Is a paid advertisement 5. Promotes both parliamentary elections (allowed) and presidential candidate (not allowed after campaign period)
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Național Liberal, prin intermediul paginii "Ucu Dima", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru candidatul prezidențial Nicolae Ciucă după încheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 445998178606699 reprezintă material de propagandă electorală plătit, distribuit pe Facebook și Instagram după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează explicit candidatul la președinție Nicolae Ciucă, menționându-l ca "Nicolae Ciucă Președinte". Postarea include număr CMF (11240002) și reprezintă în mod clar material de propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7), având obiectiv electoral explicit și adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul platformelor de social media.
